languages.text: "Да! Кому нужны каторжники? Пусть я буду сидеть на цепи у долговязых — хотя бы не сдохну, выблевав легкие!"
"Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"
languages.original_text: "Да! Кому нужны каторжники? Пусть я буду сидеть на цепи у долговязых — хотя бы не сдохну, выблевав легкие!"

traits.locale_text: "Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but I will be alive, not vomiting my lungs out!"
"Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but I will be alive, not vomiting my lungs out!"
"Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but I will be alive, not vomiting my lungs out!"
"Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but I will be alive, not vomiting my lungs out!"
"Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"
"Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"

languages.text: 「そうだ！俺達囚人のことを誰が気にする？ヒョロヒョロのクソ野郎に鎖で繋がれているかもしれないが、少なくとも生きてはいる。肺を吐き出すように咳き込まなくていい！」
languages.original_text: "Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ！俺達囚人のことを誰が気にする？ヒョロヒョロのクソ野郎に鎖で繋がれているかもしれないが、少なくとも生きてはいる。肺を吐き出すように咳き込まなくていい！」

languages.text: “是啊！谁他妈会在乎我们这群罪犯呢？那群瘦长的家伙或许会把我拴起来，但至少我还能活着，不会活活咳死！”
languages.original_text: "Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"

traits.locale_text: “是啊！谁他妈会在乎我们这群罪犯呢？那群瘦长的家伙或许会把我拴起来，但至少我还能活着，不会活活咳死！”

languages.text: « C'est vrai, ça ! Personne n'en a rien à foutre de nous autres ! Alors même si ces enfoirés me tiennent au bout d'une laisse, au moins, je suis en vie, et pas à quatre pattes en train de cracher mes poumons ! »
languages.original_text: "Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai, ça ! Personne n'en a rien à foutre de nous autres ! Alors même si ces enfoirés me tiennent au bout d'une laisse, au moins, je suis en vie, et pas à quatre pattes en train de cracher mes poumons ! »

languages.text: «¡Eso, los presos no le importamos a nadie! Estos majaderos escuchimizados querrán atarme con correa, ¡pero por lo menos estaré vivo en vez de reventarme los pulmones!».
languages.original_text: "Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Eso, los presos no le importamos a nadie! Estos majaderos escuchimizados querrán atarme con correa, ¡pero por lo menos estaré vivo en vez de reventarme los pulmones!».

languages.text: "Ja! Wer schert sich schon um uns Häftlinge? Diese schlaksigen Mistkerle halten mich zwar an einer Leine, aber zumindest lebe ich noch und huste mir nicht die Lunge aus dem Leib!"
languages.original_text: "Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"

traits.locale_text: "Ja! Wer schert sich schon um uns Häftlinge? Diese schlaksigen Mistkerle halten mich zwar an einer Leine, aber zumindest lebe ich noch und huste mir nicht die Lunge aus dem Leib!"

languages.text: "İşte bu! Bizim gibi mahkûmları kim takar? O sırıktan bozma godoşlar çok isterse beni kontrol edebilir. En azından yaşarım, böyle her öksürdüğümde ciğerlerim çıkmaz!"
languages.original_text: "Yeah! Who gives a shit about us convicts? The lanky buggers may keep me on a leash, but at least I'll be alive, not coughing up my lungs!"

traits.locale_text: "İşte bu! Bizim gibi mahkûmları kim takar? O sırıktan bozma godoşlar çok isterse beni kontrol edebilir. En azından yaşarım, böyle her öksürdüğümde ciğerlerim çıkmaz!"
